name: Windows Privilege Escalation with PrintSpoofer
description: Exploit the Print Spooler service via named pipes and impersonation to escalate privileges, similar to potato techniques but targeted at spoolss.

tools.name: PrintSpoofer
tools.description: Tool for impersonating tokens through Print Spooler RPC calls for local privilege escalation

steps.name: Download PrintSpoofer
steps.command: git clone https://github.com/itm4n/PrintSpoofer.git; cd PrintSpoofer; Build PrintSpoofer64.exe
steps.description: Clone the repo, compile the C# project for x64 (or x86), and copy to the target.

steps.name: Execute PrintSpoofer
steps.description: Run with interactive mode (-i) to spawn an elevated shell via spooler impersonation, using the command flag for payload.

steps.name: Validate Escalation
steps.description: Check output for SYSTEM; use the elevated context for further enumeration or exploitation.
